name: Mary Bowman’s Macaroni and Cheese
ingredients: 1 to 1 ½ cups uncooked muller macaroni
instructions: Cook and stir butter, salt & pepper over medium heat
Cook over low heat, stirring constantly until mixture is smooth and bubbly
Stir in milk and heat to boiling, stirring constantly
Mix macaroni and cheese mixture in 1 ½ quart casserole
Cover with Ritz cracker crumbs on top and 2 hunks butter
description: Creamy baked macaroni and cheese with Ritz cracker topping
